hints.content:
Every coin has a different value.

Coin name | Picture | Value
- | - | -
Penny | ![](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/d0799f515398b1f48cb0baa7bdc8d0c12e26c70c.png) | $1¢$
Nickel | ![](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/f6c7ae82228012be92b624995809aeabc8e95370.png) | $5¢$
Dime | ![](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/2017369b968caa0c88d046bddf2406665c8cd34d.png) | $10¢$
Quarter | ![](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/1cc5cb6f4c779c49984f5a63a58443ce0ca96ff9.png) | $25¢$

Let's label the value of each coin.

![](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/4190ef4275ccf7ed62898412a358ba3628387cf6.png)

$\underbrace{\blueE{25¢} + \blueE{25¢} + \blueE{25¢} }_{\blueE{3}{\text{ quarters}}}  + \underbrace{\goldE{5¢} +\goldE{5¢}+ \goldE{5¢}}_{\goldE{3}{\text{ nickels}}} + \underbrace{\maroonD{1¢} + \maroonD{1¢} + \maroonD{1¢}}_{\maroonD{3}{\text{ pennies}}}$

Now, let's add our quarters first: $\blueE{25¢} +\blueE{25¢} + \blueE{25¢} = \blueE{75¢}$

$\underbrace{\blueE{75¢}}_{\blueE{3}{\text{ quarters}}}  + \underbrace{\goldE{5¢} +\goldE{5¢}+ \goldE{5¢}}_{\goldE{3}{\text{ nickels}}} + \underbrace{\maroonD{1¢} + \maroonD{1¢} + \maroonD{1¢}}_{\maroonD{3}{\text{ pennies}}}$

Next, let's add our nickels: $\goldE{5¢} + \goldE{5¢}+ \goldE{5¢} = \goldE{15¢}$

$\underbrace{\blueE{75¢}}_{\blueE{3}{\text{ quarters}}}  + \underbrace{\goldE{15¢}}_{\goldE{3}{\text{ nickels}}} + \underbrace{\maroonD{1¢} + \maroonD{1¢} + \maroonD{1¢}}_{\maroonD{3}{\text{ pennies}}}$

Next, let's add our pennies: $\maroonD{1¢} + \maroonD{1¢}+ \maroonD{1¢} = \maroonD{3¢}$

$\underbrace{\blueE{75¢}}_{\blueE{3}{\text{ quarters}}}  + \underbrace{\goldE{15¢}}_{\goldE{3}{\text{ nickels}}} + \underbrace{\maroonD{3¢}}_{\maroonD{3}{\text{ pennies}}}$

Last, let's add the value of all our coins together.

$\underbrace{\blueE{75¢}}_{\blueE{3}{\text{ quarters}}}  + \underbrace{\goldE{15¢}}_{\goldE{3}{\text{ nickels}}} + \underbrace{\maroonD{3¢}}_{\maroonD{3}{\text{ pennies}}} = 93¢$

question.content:
**What is the total value of the coins below?**  

![](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/4190ef4275ccf7ed62898412a358ba3628387cf6.png)

[[☃ numeric-input 1]] cents
